snippet.title: Dread Dawn Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Search for   Dread Dawn   on Steam to view detailed information about this game. It is currently available for free trial on Steam. Welcome to add it to your wishlist to support our development :)
Steam link    :     store.steampowered.com/app/2093920

About this game：This is an open-world zombie survival game set in a quarantined city. You play as a student left behind due to missing the evacuation convoy. Together with classmates and other survivors, you must defend the school, survive, and await rescue.
